SEARCH
Package com.pizzashop.project4

Class SpecialtyPizzasController

java.lang.Object
com.pizzashop.project4.SpecialtyPizzasController
public class SpecialtyPizzasController extends Object
Controller class for the 'Specialty Pizzas' interface This class handles user interactions for selecting between 5 preset specialty pizzas: Deluxe, Meatzza, Pepperoni, Seafood, and Supreme. It provides methods to select size, add extra cheese/sauce, and manage the pizza order.

  • Method Details

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(MainMenuController controller)
      Sets the main menu controller for this controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - The main menu controller to be set.

    • setOrder

      public void setOrder(Order order)
      Sets the order associated with this pizza selection session.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to be set.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller, setting up the user interface and default values. This method configures the initial settings of the components and sets up event handlers.

    • capitalize

      private String capitalize(String input)
      Converts a string to capitalized format. This utility method capitalizes the first letter of the input string.
      Parameters:
      input - The string to be capitalized.
      Returns:
      The capitalized string.

    • handleSpecialtySelect

      private void handleSpecialtySelect()
      Handles the action of selecting one of the 5 specialty pizzas. The method is triggered when one of the ComboBox's options are selecte. It updates the toppings, sauce, price, image, size, and extras accordingly.

    • updatePizzaImage

      private void updatePizzaImage(String pizzaType)
      Updates the image of the specialty pizza chosen. This method causes the FXML interface to display the proper image corresponding to the specific specialty pizza that the user selects.
      Parameters:
      pizzaType - as String

    • updateToppingsDisplay

      private void updateToppingsDisplay(Pizza pizza)
      Updates the toppings that are displayed, corresponding to the specific specialty pizza. This method changes the toppings displayed when a new specialty pizza is selected.
      Parameters:
      pizza - as Pizza object

    • updateSauceDisplay

      private void updateSauceDisplay(Pizza pizza)
      Updates the sauce that is displayed, corresponding to the specific specialty pizza. This method changes the sauce displayed when a new specialty pizza is selected.
      Parameters:
      pizza - as Pizza object

    • handleSizeChange

      private void handleSizeChange()
      Handles changes in pizza size. This method updates the pizza size and recalculates the price when a different size is selected.

    • handlePriceChange

      private void handlePriceChange()
      Updates the price display based on the current configuration of the pizza. This method recalculates and updates the price display whenever changes are made to the pizza.

    • handleExtraSelect

      public void handleExtraSelect()
      Handles the selection of extra cheese or extra sauce. This method is triggered when the extra cheese or extra sauce checkboxes are toggled.

    • handleExtraSelectForOrder

      public void handleExtraSelectForOrder(Pizza pizza)
      Handles the selection of extra cheese or extra sauce for adding to the user's order. This method is called when the "Add to Order" button is clicked, and it applies the corresponding price changes to the 'Pizza' instance to add the pizza to the order.
      Parameters:
      pizza - as Pizza object

    • handleAddToOrder

      private void handleAddToOrder()
      Adds the configured pizza to the order. This method is called when the user finalizes their pizza selection/customization and adds it to their order.

    • resetOrderUI

      private void resetOrderUI()
      Resets the UI of the 'Specialty Pizzas' interface to the default selections. This method is called when the user clicks "Add to Order" so that they can continue with customizing a new pizza for their order.
